title: Nipun Batra
text:
Nipun Batra is an Assistant Professor in Computer Science at IIT Gandhinagar. He previously completed his postdoc from University of Virginia. He completed his PhD. from IIIT Delhi where he was a TCS PhD fellow. His group broadly works on machine learning/AI/sensors/IoT for computational sustainability problems like smart buildings and air quality.
His work has been awarded several awards, including, the best PhD presentation at ACM Sensys, best demo at ACM Buildsys, and a best video nominee at ACM KDD.
He is working with his team towards a Jupyter book on code first understanding machine learning.
